name: Controlled useState
description: Sortable table with two columns (name, score), visual sort indicators, and stable sorting logic using controlled components with useState hook
approach: Uses React's useState hook to manage sort field and direction states. Implements stable sorting with useMemo for performance optimization. Provides visual sort indicators and console logging.
features: Console logging in required format: 'Sort: field={field} dir={direction}'
Stable sorting with secondary sort by name
Clickable column headers with hover effects
Bootstrap table styling with responsive design
Statistics panel with averages and ranges
